description: This file defines a Java interface for a Spring Data JPA repository handling TaxSetting entities, including a custom query method to find tax settings by Partner.

classes.name: TaxSettingRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for accessing TaxSetting entities with a custom method to find tax settings by Partner.

methods.name: findByPartner
methods.description: Finds a list of TaxSetting entities associated with a given Partner entity.
